primary_phone.purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing for Washington, DC citations.

sections.authority_name: District of Columbia Department of Motor Vehicles

serves.description: Parking citations issued by District parking enforcement within Washington, DC.

how_to_recognize.notes: Citation numbers are numeric and printed on official DC DMV parking tickets.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals (requests for adjudication) can be submitted online, by mail, or in person at the Adjudication Service Center.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the mailing address and procedures for contesting DC parking citations.

verification.verified_source_note: Mail adjudication address verified from DC DMV contest page【86828217279799†L210-L214】.

sections.authority_name: Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority (Metro Transit Police)

serves.description: Citations issued by Metro Transit Police for parking or transit-related violations on WMATA property.

how_to_recognize.notes: Metro Transit Police citations may list a numeric citation number and reference the Metro Transit Police Department.

submission_methods.notes: The OAH payment instructions indicate appeals and payments are handled by mailing or visiting the Metro Transit Police Department. Online appeal information is not provided.

confirm_by_phone.department: WMATA Customer Service / Metro Transit Police
confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm Metro Transit Police appeal procedures and mailing address for citation disputes.

verification.verified_source_note: Mailing address for Metro Transit Police citations taken from DC OAH pay a fine page【268431043447614†L186-L214】; dedicated appeal procedure not explicitly stated.

sections.canonical_section_name: Georgetown University Office of Transportation Management

serves.description: Parking citations issued on Georgetown University campus by the Office of Transportation Management.

how_to_recognize.notes: Georgetown citations include a numeric citation number and university branding.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals may be filed by submitting a written explanation with supporting documentation by mail or via email/online according to the university's instructions.

confirm_by_phone.department: Georgetown University Office of Transportation Management
confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm correct mailing address and procedures for appealing Georgetown University parking citations.

verification.verified_source_note: Mailing address and appeal instructions confirmed from Georgetown University's transportation website【533436416001918†L116-L130】.

serves.description: Parking citations issued by American University's Office of Parking & Commuter Services on campus property.

how_to_recognize.notes: American University citations typically feature a numeric identifier and university branding.

submission_methods.notes: American University requires appeals to be submitted through their online appeal form within 30 days; mail submissions are not accepted.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: American University only accepts appeals through an online form and does not provide a mailing address for Phase-1 appeals.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm that appeals must be submitted online and verify there is no mailing address for American University parking citations.

verification.verified_source_note: AU parking page emphasizes online appeals and provides a mailing address only for payments【830267926504522†L220-L241】【830267926504522†L252-L272】.

serves.description: Parking citations issued on Howard University campus property by Parking & Transportation Services.

how_to_recognize.notes: Howard University citations are likely numeric and bear university identifiers.

submission_methods.notes: Howard University operates a Citation Appeal Board that meets monthly; no mailing or online appeal instructions are publicly listed.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: Howard University has a citation appeal board but does not publish a mailing address or procedure for Phase-1 appeals.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm whether Howard University provides a mail or online address for appealing campus parking citations.

verification.verified_source_note: Howard University citation services page mentions an appeal board but provides no mailing address【658771654898175†L72-L79】.

sections.canonical_section_name: Gallaudet University Department of Public Safety

serves.description: Parking citations issued on Gallaudet University campus property by the Department of Public Safety.

how_to_recognize.notes: Gallaudet citations include a numeric identifier and may reference the Department of Public Safety.

submission_methods.notes: Gallaudet University provides an online appeal form for parking citations; in-person appeals may be arranged through the public safety office.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: Appeal information is submitted online; no mailing address is provided for Gallaudet University parking citation appeals.

confirm_by_phone.department: Gallaudet University Department of Public Safety
confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm that appeals must be submitted online and verify there is no mailing address for Gallaudet University parking citations.

verification.verified_source_note: Gallaudet's traffic violation appeal form is online and lists contact phone numbers but no mailing address【703572488523852†L886-L916】【310059801640039†L950-L1041】.

serves.description: Parking citations issued on George Washington University campus by Parking Services.

how_to_recognize.notes: GWU citation numbers are likely numeric and accompanied by university identifiers.

submission_methods.notes: George Washington University manages citations through an online parking portal; no mailing address for appeals is provided.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: GWU's parking services website requires appeals to be handled online; there is no published mailing address for Phase-1 appeals.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm whether a mailing address exists for appealing GWU parking citations and verify online appeal process.

verification.verified_source_note: GWU directory lists parking services contact information but does not provide a mailing address for citation appeals【909067728513616†L40-L58】.

blocking_issues: Metro Transit Police (WMATA) appeal procedures require confirmation; limited information is available on mailing address and online options.
American University, Howard University, Gallaudet University, and GWU sections lack verified mailing addresses for Phase-1 appeals.
known_gaps: Citation number patterns for all authorities are approximations with low confidence.
Some campus and special district authorities require further phone confirmation to verify appeal routing and mailing addresses.
